ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Plants Expanded : All Trees All Biomes Optional Patch
ModMetaData.author: be37
ModMetaData.description:
I was Just wanna make bearberry farm in my bunker on ice sheet.
A simple patch that replace all "mustBeWildToSow" value to false on VPE tree defs so you can sow all kind of VPE trees in any biomes.
